array.string: The default score multiplier is 10x. This means that sinking a ship with a base score of 500 will yield 5000 points. Your score multiplier will increase by completing objectives and ranking up.

Cannonballs on deck represent your accuracy bonus. Shooting a ship will add a cannonball, and missing will remove one. When you have 3 cannonballs on deck, you will receive 25% more score from all sources.

Your cannon shots can ricochet to nearby ships that are within the cannonball's ricochet cone. This enables you to sink up to 6 ships with a single shot. Each ship sunk in the ricochet chain receives an increasing score bonus.

Each time you sink a rival pirate ship, you capture the ship's captain. Touch the plank to feed them to the sharks for extra score. There's only room in the brig for 6 prisoners, so be sure to feed the sharks regularly!
Molten Shot: Shoots two extra cannonballs.
Venom Shot: Spawns pools of acid.
Crimson Shot: Knocks enemy crew overboard.
Brandy Slick: Burns ships when ignited.
Powder Kegs: Explosive barrels in the water.
Trawling Net: Slows ships within its radius.
Navy Colors: Stops enemies from firing at you.
Hand of Davy: Drags ships underwater.
Tornado Storm: Destroys ships in its path.
Ghost Ship: While under the effect of this^spell, you cannot be hit or get a red cross.
Whirlpool: Swallows ships in its vortex.
Sea of Lava: Turns the ocean to lava and^spawns pools of magma.
Potions: Customize your playstyle from rank 2.
New voodoo spell: Sea of Lava.
New objectives: Highest rank is now 24.
3 new Voodoo Spells: Ghost Ship, Hand of^Davy and Sea of Lava!
2 new Munitions: Brandy Slick and Navy Colors!
Rank up to level 24 and top the leaderboards with a 34x score multiplier!
Unlock powerful Voodoo Potions to customize^your play and earn over 20 achievements!
Do you have a spare 20 seconds^to rate Awesome Pirates?
